summary: *Metropolis* is a classic science-fiction movie from 1927. It's about a futuristic city where rich and poor people are separated. Freder, the rich son, and Maria, a worker, try to bring everyone together. The film looks amazing with its unique design and special effects. While some critics didn't like the story, many now think it's one of the best films ever. It's even on UNESCO's important list! The film is now in the public domain, so everyone can watch and enjoy it.
title: Metropolis (1927 film)
